name: Ferris Wheel
summary: Step into the immersive world of VR with Ferris Wheel! Take control of your virtual Ferris Wheel ride by setting the speed and duration to your liking. Whether you prefer a slow and serene ride or a fast-paced thrill, the choice is yours. Perfectly crafted for VR, this experience offers stunning visuals, realistic physics, and the joy of soaring high above a picturesque virtual landscape. Ideal for relaxation or fun, Ferris Wheel is your ticket to unforgettable moments in the VR realm. Download now and...
